Welcome to Birmingham Orthodontics! We have been providing affordable, quality orthodontic care since we were founded by Dr Michael McCarthy in 1993. Located in Alabaster, Hoover, and Trussville Alabama, our practice’s top priority is to provide our patients with a smile they deserve! We recognize that every patient has different needs, and we pride ourselves in the courteous service we deliver to each person who walks through our doors. We know a person’s self image is so important to them and a smile can last a lifetime. That is why it is our goal to offer braces and aligners at a price you can afford! We offer braces with no down payment and low monthly payments. Whether you’re an adult, adolescent or child, our knowledgeable doctors and staff are committed to helping you achieve the smile you deserve - a healthy, beautiful one. Please visit our website www.BhamSmile.com to learn more about our practice and locations.
Gilbert Orthodontics is located in Birmingham Alabama. These orthodontists offer traditional braces as well as clear braces for adults and kids.
Dieguez Smiles Orthodontics provides orthodontic care at locations in Birmingham and Fairfield, AL.

Welcome to Weissman Orthodontics in Birmingham, where your smile transformation begins. Led by Dr. Sherri Weissman, our expert team is committed to providing exceptional orthodontic care. Experience the difference and achieve your dream smile with Weissman Orthodontics.

Bates Orthodontics provides quality orthodontic care with a service-first approach to establish a stable foundation of oral health for all patients. We are a small family practice making a big impact in the Birmingham area. Grounded in science and service, we help create smiles that can change people’s lives for good. At Bates Orthodontics we strive to achieve great outcomes through careful, doctor-directed treatment plans that coincide with patient goals and produce the healthiest long-term results for each individual. This intentional, individualized method allows us to preserve facial harmony and improve the functional and esthetic aspects of a smile. Everything we do is aligned with our values of service and leadership.

There are a lot of things in life that are unfixable, but having a bad smile isn't one of them. Don't settle for a bad smile for the rest of your life! With Birmingham Brace's affordable and convenient one-time plan at just $99 a month, people of all ages can come and get the smile they are proud of showing off. Simple prices with no hidden charges. Feel confident now. Book an appointment today by calling (205) 956-4277!

We offer the most current orthodontic treatment including traditional metal braces, InvisalignÂ® aligners, ceramic braces, and more. Contact us to get started on a great smile today! Our Birmingham orthodontic office serves the areas of Birmingham, Riverchase, and Pelham at 2029 Old Montgomery Highway, only minutes from Riverchase Middle and Elementary Schools. Aspen Dental dentists are dedicated to making it easier to get the care you need. They believe in treating each patient like family and providing comprehensive care in a compassionate and judgment-free environment. At Aspen Dental, we've simplified everything to give you peace of mind. We make payment the easy part with transparent pricing and our commitment to everyday low prices. We offer all dental and denture services and we'll work with you on your treatment plan to find what works best for you. Our dentures are custom crafted in our on-site denture labs for speedy turnaround in as little as 24 hours and provide the most natural fit, look, and feel. We're here for you when you need us most with convenient locations and extended office hours, including evenings and select Saturdays. Scheduling an appointment is easy! We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Vital Smiles was founded in 2003 with the overall goal of making quality dental care available and affordable for more families than ever before. We believe it’s vital that every patient we serve has access to proper dental healthcare, so we accept Medicaid, ALL Kids, most insurance, including Blue Cross, Delta Dental, Southland, CIGNA and Aetna, and several other payment options. At Vital Smiles, our success is the result of our teams’ commitment to the values of our organization. The values we share are essential to creating a welcoming, comfortable atmosphere for both our employees and the children we serve. Our values allow us to build positive relationships with patients and their families and set a standard of excellence for everyone involved. Here at Vital Smiles we think of ourselves as a family, and we hope you’ll consider making us your children’s Dental Home.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Business Name: Clark Holmes Smith Oral Facial Surgery
Business Information: Oral & Maxillofacial Surgeons, Mark Clark, D.M.D., M.D., F.A.C.S.,F.I.C.D., Jon D. Holmes, D.M.D. and George W. Matthews Jr., D.M.D., Birmingham, AL, practice a full scope of oral and maxillofacial surgery with expertise ranging from corrective jaw surgery to wisdom tooth removal. We can also diagnose and treat facial pain, facial injuries and performs a full range of dental implant and bone grafting procedures.

At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. Our practice is devoted to comprehensive and preventive patient care, general dental care, with a special expertise in cosmetic dentistry.Our patients are our top priority, and we strive to develop long-lasting, trusting relationships with all of our patients. Your referrals are welcome and appreciated. 
 
We look forward to seeing you and your smile!

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. If you suffer from dental anxiety, we make every effort to discuss your concerns, educate you on dental procedures and offer sedation dentistry to ensure your comfort and confidence in your dental treatment.

Addressing your individual needs is priority number one at Moulton Dentistry. When there's a dental service you need, chances are high that you can find it under one roof when you visit Dr. Marc Moulton! His preventive treatments, including cleanings, exams, X-rays and oral cancer screenings ensure that if a dental problem appears, we catch it sooner rather than later. Of course, his restorative, cosmetic, emergency and sedation dentistry can help you restore, enhance and manage your dental concerns in a calming office environment. He gladly accepts dental insurance from many different providers and offers an in-house membership savings plan for those lacking insurance but in need of treatment. Feel free to call his office to get started!

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Vital Smiles was founded in 2003 with the overall goal of making quality dental care available and affordable for more families than ever before. We believe it’s vital that every patient we serve has access to proper dental healthcare, so we accept Medicaid, ALL Kids, most insurance, including Blue Cross, Delta Dental, Southland, CIGNA and Aetna, and several other payment options. At Vital Smiles, our success is the result of our teams’ commitment to the values of our organization. The values we share are essential to creating a welcoming, comfortable atmosphere for both our employees and the children we serve. Our values allow us to build positive relationships with patients and their families and set a standard of excellence for everyone involved. Here at Vital Smiles we think of ourselves as a family, and we hope you’ll consider making us your children’s Dental Home.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. We look forward to seeing you and your smile!

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. If you suffer from dental anxiety, we make every effort to discuss your concerns, educate you on dental procedures and offer sedation dentistry to ensure your comfort and confidence in your dental treatment.

Addressing your individual needs is priority number one at Moulton Dentistry. When there's a dental service you need, chances are high that you can find it under one roof when you visit Dr. Marc Moulton! His preventive treatments, including cleanings, exams, X-rays and oral cancer screenings ensure that if a dental problem appears, we catch it sooner rather than later. Of course, his restorative, cosmetic, emergency and sedation dentistry can help you restore, enhance and manage your dental concerns in a calming office environment. He gladly accepts dental insurance from many different providers and offers an in-house membership savings plan for those lacking insurance but in need of treatment. Feel free to call his office to get started!

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Vital Smiles was founded in 2003 with the overall goal of making quality dental care available and affordable for more families than ever before. We believe it’s vital that every patient we serve has access to proper dental healthcare, so we accept Medicaid, ALL Kids, most insurance, including Blue Cross, Delta Dental, Southland, CIGNA and Aetna, and several other payment options. At Vital Smiles, our success is the result of our teams’ commitment to the values of our organization. Our values allow us to build positive relationships with patients and their families and set a standard of excellence for everyone involved. Here at Vital Smiles we think of ourselves as a family, and we hope you’ll consider making us your children’s Dental Home.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. If you suffer from dental anxiety, we make every effort to discuss your concerns, educate you on dental procedures and offer sedation dentistry to ensure your comfort and confidence in your dental treatment.

Addressing your individual needs is priority number one at Moulton Dentistry. When there's a dental service you need, chances are high that you can find it under one roof when you visit Dr. Marc Moulton! His preventive treatments, including cleanings, exams, X-rays and oral cancer screenings ensure that if a dental problem appears, we catch it sooner rather than later. Of course, his restorative, cosmetic, emergency and sedation dentistry can help you restore, enhance and manage your dental concerns in a calming office environment. He gladly accepts dental insurance from many different providers and offers an in-house membership savings plan for those lacking insurance but in need of treatment. Feel free to call his office to get started!

Welcome to Rocky Ridge Dental Associates where we give you a reason to smile. Our office is dedicated to providing excellent dental care in a peaceful, friendly, and professional environment. We have offered quality dentistry in Vestavia Hills, Alabama, and the surrounding areas of Hoover, Mountain Brook, Homewood, Birmingham, and Shelby County, Alabama, for over twenty years. We established this practice with the foundation of excellence in dental care, providing you with a combination of beauty, comfort, and precision in your treatment. 
 
Beauty—We strive to imitate nature in esthetics in order to create the most beautiful smiles. 
Comfort—Our treatments must result in your ability to chew, talk, and smile with confidence. 
Precision—Dr. Roy A. Smith, III uses clinical microscopes to increase his ability to provide precise dental treatment. Our hygienists also use magnification during your cleanings. 
Our office uses the latest technical expertise to enhance our treatment and ensure you the quality dental care you expect. We are dedicated to expanding our knowledge through many hours of continuing education each year. That is our commitment to you. Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. Addressing your individual needs is priority number one at Moulton Dentistry. Of course, his restorative, cosmetic, emergency and sedation dentistry can help you restore, enhance and manage your dental concerns in a calming office environment. He gladly accepts dental insurance from many different providers and offers an in-house membership savings plan for those lacking insurance but in need of treatment. Feel free to call his office to get started!

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. For questions about what we can do for you or to schedule an appointment, call our office at (205) 326-8060.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. As trained medical professionals, our dedication to maintaining a safe environment through rigorous infection control procedures is at our core. We know that moving forward our commitment to your safety will be even more important. While continuing to meet traditional CDC and OSHA requirements, we are adopting some new, additional protocols.  For example, we might wear additional PPE, request you wear a mask to your appointment, or take your temperature upon arrival. We may also ask you to wash your hands, request you wait in a treatment room or your vehicle instead of the waiting room, or request that you call in payment after your appointment. Clairmont Cosmetic & Family Dentistry  is your go-to practice for comfortable, caring dental treatment. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.
